channel.title: Shot a bird with an air rifle, Now i feel realy bad
channel.description:
Well, my friend owns an old sniper air rifle.
so we setup a few targets in the yard, placed 2 chairs a table and a few beers. And we started shooting targets, after a while it got boring.
So i saw a small bird in the tree of the neighbours, so my friend took the gun and shot and he missed.
So i took over the gun, loaded it and was thinking "i will proberly miss, because its a small bird and its in the neighbours tree." So i shot, and i hitted his little wing, i saw him fly away and make some crazy loops and crash in the yard of the neighbours.
My friend yelled, and said HAHAHA NICEE!# but i felt horrible after seeing him crash. I wanted to check out if it was hurted or in pain or it was oke and flyed away, or if it was dead.
But we couldn't see throught the bushes in the neighbours yard. So we went inside because it started raining.
But now i feel realy horrible..

item.title: Shot a bird with an air rifle, Now i feel realy bad
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

This topic went from shooting a bird to cooking animals, to marinating steak in beer, to magpies, to the nature of magpies. Wtf lol.

OT: Most of the people saying you’re a softy and what not are either still kids, or are acting like one. As multiple people said, don’t be a dick and kill something unless you plan on eating some part of it.

item.title: Shot a bird with an air rifle, Now i feel realy bad
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:25, topic:516539”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=634800.msg4285145#msg4285145 date=1366236613]

I’d have a problem shooting a little bird, but I’d have no problem shooting a magpie or something like that. I guess everybody has their soft spots.

That isn’t nice, you know magpies remember faces right? If you feed them they become really friendly, or if they know you don’t pose a threat to them.
[/quote]
Is that actually true? I remember my gramdmother used to have practically a pet magpie, that was so friendly to her and never wanted to do anything but peck my eyes out[/quote]
Yep, many people that i know actually have a type of wild pet magpie.

Read full topic

I’d have a problem shooting a little bird, but I’d have no problem shooting a magpie or something like that. I guess everybody has their soft spots.

That isn’t nice, you know magpies remember faces right? If you feed them they become really friendly, or if they know you don’t pose a threat to them.

item.title: Shot a bird with an air rifle, Now i feel realy bad
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Simpsons did it.

en.wikipedia.org

Bart the Mother

Phil Hartman as Troy McClure "Bart the Mother" is the third episode of The Simpsons' tenth season. It originally aired on the Fox network in the United States on September 27, 1998. In the episode, Bart accidentally kills a mother bird with a BB gun, and decides to hatch and take care of the two eggs he found in the bird's nest. "Bart the Mother" was written by David X. Cohen and directed by Steven Dean Moore; it was the last full-length episode Cohen wrote for The Simpsons before leaving to work...

Read full topic
item.source: Shot a bird with an air rifle, Now i feel realy bad

item.title: Shot a bird with an air rifle, Now i feel realy bad
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:6, topic:516539”]I’m sorry to hear that it was raining, just think how the bird you shot for no reason feels. It’s like shooting you in the legs, leaving you on a road, and then making it rain. If you’re going to shoot an illegal weapon and potentially cause suffering to an animal for no reason, then at least have the balls to go into your neighbours yard and either try and help it, or finish the job you started.

I could never shoot anything for no reason, and then let it die a horrible death. It’s sadistic.[/quote]
+1

If you haven’t already go check on the bird and do what needs to be done and never do a silly act like that again.

Read full topic

item.title: Shot a bird with an air rifle, Now i feel realy bad
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

It’s O.K. It gets easier over time. You should have at least finished it off though. That bird might have had little birdies to feed… now it can’t provide, because It’s wing got blown off by someone with too much time on their hands. I’m not trying to incite an argument, I’m just saying…
